post.title: NAudio Nominated for a Niney!
post.author: Mark Heath
post.content: I received news recently that NAudio has been nominated for a Niney award (for “favourite Codeplex project) at the forthcoming MIX 11 conference. There’s some stiff competition as there are some other excellent CodePlex projects nominated including Laurent Bugnion’s excellent MVVM Light toolkit. So do head over to Channel 9 and vote, and maybe I’ll get round to finally releasing NAudio 1.4 in the not too distant future.

comment.author: Ryan
comment.content:
Congrats, Mark!
There's something that I would like to ask. May I know how should I use the 'Timeline' control in Naudio? Thank you.

comment.author: Mark H
comment.content: I'm afraid the Timeline control was never finished. It should probably be deleted.

comment.author: Ryan
comment.content: I see. That's a waste. Is there any way that I can edit the controls?
